Name: LU 925 - Zoning, 103-16 Van Wyck Expressway Rezoning, Queens (C 210164 ZMQ)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 210164 ZMQ, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 925).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

December 15, 2021 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files
LOCATING ENVIRONMENTAL REVIEW MATERIALS FOR CERTAIN LAND USE APPLICATIONS
Minutes of the Stated Meeting - December 15, 2021

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca, Jr. and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, 10316 Van Wyck Exp LLC,\expndtw-6  filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 18c, changing from an R3A District to an R6B District and establishing within a proposed R6B District a C2-3 District, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the development of a four-story mixed-use building with 18 dwelling units at 103-16 Van Wyck Expressway in the South Ozone Park neighborhood of Queens, Community District 10 (ULURP No. C 210164 ZMQ) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on November 5, 2021, its decision dated November 3, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 210165 ZRQ (L.U. No. 926), a zoning text amendment to establish a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on November 18, 2021;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Negative Declaration issued July 26, 2021 (CEQR No. 20DCP161Q) which includes an (E) designation related to hazardous materials and noise to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts (the \ldblquote E\rdblquote  Designation (E-600));\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 210164 ZMQ, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 18c:\b\par
\b0  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li720\qj\cf1 1.\tab changing from an R3A District to an R6B District property bounded by a line 100 \cf0\tab\cf1 feet southeasterly of Liberty Avenue, the northeasterly service road of Van Wyck Expressway, a line 195 feet northwesterly of 105\super th\nosupersub  Avenue and its northeasterly prolongation, and a line midway between 135\super th\nosupersub  Street and Van Wyck Expressway; and\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\cf1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li720\qj 2.\tab establishing within a proposed R6B District a C2-3 District bounded by a line 100 feet southeasterly of Liberty Avenue, Van Wyck Expressway, a line 195 feet northwesterly of 105\super th\nosupersub  Avenue, and a line midway between 135\super th\nosupersub  Street and Van Wyck Expressway;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\cf0  \par
Borough of Queens, Community District 10, as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated July 26, 2021.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on ______________, 2021, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
